name: Pandamonium
description:
A world in which animals have evolved with human-like abilities. A panda discovers a hidden cave and discovers a place that was meant to be hidden forever. Discover this amazing world with inspiration from greek mythology. Jump and dodge through this amazing 2.5D world with hand drawn crisp pixel art .Explore astonishing hidden lands and places. Face dangerous foes and bosses and make new allies along the way!




UNCOVER BURIED TRUTHS

Discover the hidden land behind the cave. What bizarre world lives underneath these dark depths of the world. This world is not as dark and gloomy as it seems! Find beautiful landscapes, caverns, harsh deserts, and abandoned towns filled with things to explore and uncover!

FACE YOUR FEAR

Fight dangerous enemies who won't hesitate to kill you on sight! Each enemy you face is unique and will have a different mechanic you must learn to defeat. Learn each enemy's backstory that will help you understand how to beat it. Your death will have consequences!

SEVEN DEADLY SINS

Enter Pandæmonium the lost capital of hell. This connects to the lands of the seven lords! You must face these perilous bosses of the underworld to reveal truths of the lost capital. Each boss battle is unique and will be extremely difficult so use all your strength and wits to face them.

YOU ARE NOT ALONE

Meet allies who will help you on your journey. Make new friends with an interactive dialogue system. The choices you make will ripple out throughout the story. Be careful though some characters are more than what meets the eye.

GAIN POWER

Customize yourself with various powerful outfits that you can use depending on the situation. Empower yourself with a variety of different powerups and potions that will augment your ability and playstyle. Obtain these abilities by interacting with the world and finding hidden loot.

2.5D PIXEL ART

Enrich yourself within this beautiful and treacherous world with gorgeous hand drawn crisp pixel art animation and artwork.
